EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - DC
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Washington, DC.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Wednesday, June 8th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/washingtondc]]>
Location VMware <[[https://www.vmware.com/company/office_locations/office_virginia]]> 12100 Sunset Hills Rd 6th Floor, Kennedy Room Reston, VA 20190 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/12100+Sunset+Hills+Rd,+Reston,+VA+20190/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b6481baceb04fd:0xcc2d6b8b95c27190?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj8w52foozNAhUUUmMKHcl5AvcQ8gEIGzAA]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
